snippet: The Marine was shot and killed by another guard; however, base officials said they did not consider the shooting an act of terrorism.
abstract: Guard at Camp Lejeune Marine Corps base in North Carolina is in custody after he shoots and kills another guard in an isolated incident.
lead_paragraph: The Marine was shot and killed by another guard; however, base officials said they did not consider the shooting an act of terrorism.

headline.main: Marine Shoots Fellow Guard at North Carolina Base
headline.print_headline: Marine Shoots Fellow Guard at North Carolina Base

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
